meanings.sent1: The garden was full of flowered plants.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful flowered dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so flowered that it looked like a garden.
meanings.sent4: The sky at sunset was a flowered canvas of pink and orange hues.
meanings.sent5: The room was transformed into a flowered paradise with colorful blooms everywhere.

meanings.sent1: The vase on the table was flowered with fresh roses.
meanings.sent2: The tree in the backyard was flowered with blossoms in spring.
meanings.sent3: The birthday cake was flowered with edible sugar flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a flowered crown of daisies and daffodils.
meanings.sent5: The field was a flowered carpet of daisies, poppies, and tulips.

meanings.sent1: The rose bush flowered beautifully in the summer.
meanings.sent2: The cherry tree flowered early this year.
meanings.sent3: The garden suddenly flowered with color after the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her talent flowered when she started painting.
meanings.sent5: The city flowered with life during the festival.
